instruction: Convert the requirement into a PlantUML class diagram. Return only PlantUML code.
input: The system shall allow a Driver to start the vehicle using an EngineStartButton. The EngineControlUnit shall verify the BrakePedal is pressed before starting the engine.
output:
@startuml
class Driver
class EngineStartButton
class EngineControlUnit
class BrakePedal

Driver --> EngineStartButton : presses
EngineStartButton --> EngineControlUnit : startRequest()
EngineControlUnit --> BrakePedal : checkPressed()
@enduml

instruction: Convert the requirement into a PlantUML class diagram. Return only PlantUML code.
input: The CameraSensor shall capture frames and send them to the PerceptionModule.

instruction: Convert the requirement into a PlantUML class diagram. Return only PlantUML code.
input: The AdaptiveCruiseController shall read VehicleSpeed and command the ThrottleActuator.
output:
@startuml
class AdaptiveCruiseController
class VehicleSpeed
class ThrottleActuator

AdaptiveCruiseController --> VehicleSpeed : reads
AdaptiveCruiseController --> ThrottleActuator : commandThrottle()
@enduml

instruction: Convert the requirement into a PlantUML class diagram. Return only PlantUML code.
input: The LaneKeepingAssist shall receive LaneMarkers from the VisionModule.
output:
@startuml
class LaneKeepingAssist
class VisionModule
class LaneMarkers

VisionModule --> LaneMarkers : provides
LaneKeepingAssist --> VisionModule : requests
@enduml

instruction: Convert the requirement into a PlantUML class diagram. Return only PlantUML code.
input: The CollisionWarningSystem shall use RadarSensor data to send warnings to the HMI.
output:
@startuml
class CollisionWarningSystem
class RadarSensor
class HMI

RadarSensor --> CollisionWarningSystem : radarData
CollisionWarningSystem --> HMI : warning
@enduml

instruction: Convert the requirement into a PlantUML class diagram. Return only PlantUML code.
input: The BrakeController shall receive BrakePedal input and command the BrakeActuator.
output:
@startuml
class BrakeController
class BrakePedal
class BrakeActuator

BrakePedal --> BrakeController : brakeInput
BrakeController --> BrakeActuator : applyBrake()
@enduml

instruction: Convert the requirement into a PlantUML class diagram. Return only PlantUML code.
input: The DoorLockController shall lock and unlock the VehicleDoor based on Driver commands.
output:
@startuml
class DoorLockController
class VehicleDoor
class Driver

Driver --> DoorLockController : lockUnlockCommand
DoorLockController --> VehicleDoor : lock()/unlock()
@enduml

instruction: Convert the requirement into a PlantUML class diagram. Return only PlantUML code.
input: The SpeedLimitWarningSystem shall compare VehicleSpeed with SpeedLimit and warn the Driver.
output:
@startuml
class SpeedLimitWarningSystem
class VehicleSpeed
class SpeedLimit
class Driver

SpeedLimitWarningSystem --> VehicleSpeed : reads
SpeedLimitWarningSystem --> SpeedLimit : reads
SpeedLimitWarningSystem --> Driver : warning
@enduml

instruction: Convert the requirement into a PlantUML class diagram. Return only PlantUML code.
input: The ParkingAssistSystem shall use UltrasonicSensor data to assist the Driver during parking.
output:
@startuml
class ParkingAssistSystem
class UltrasonicSensor
class Driver

UltrasonicSensor --> ParkingAssistSystem : distanceData
ParkingAssistSystem --> Driver : parkingGuidance
@enduml

instruction: Convert the requirement into a PlantUML class diagram. Return only PlantUML code.
input: The TurnIndicatorController shall activate the LeftIndicator or RightIndicator based on Driver input.
output:
@startuml
class TurnIndicatorController
class LeftIndicator
class RightIndicator
class Driver

Driver --> TurnIndicatorController : indicatorCommand
TurnIndicatorController --> LeftIndicator : activate()
TurnIndicatorController --> RightIndicator : activate()
@enduml
